text: 9:4: Jôk 30:1-6; Jôk 25:10-16; Jôk 16:33; Tel 17:8-10; Jôk 25:16; Bal 10:3-5 Asûnga han mirimhoi hâlna mun rângkachak mâichâm le rângkachaka minluon Chonginkhit sumduk a oma, Ma sûnga han “Manna” omna rângkachak sungkola ngei, Aaron sunrol abuo hôn cher ngei le chongpêkngei a chunga ânziek lungpêk inik ngei hah an om.
